content: this pattern is available for free on my blog or you can choose to purchase the large print ad-free pdf from ravelry the french lilacs baby blanket is an elegant lacy blanket destined to wow everyone at your next baby shower or welcome home party the pattern is not overly complicated even though it is a six row repeat the only stitches you need to know are single_crochet and double_crochet you can customize this blanket to any size imaginable the finished blanket is truly beautiful and you can also use any size yarn you wish from size 1 sock yarn all the way up to size 6 super bulky it s a very versatile pattern the example is worked in size 3 light weight yarn and used a h/8 5 00 mm crochet hook there is a link to the video stitch tutorial in the notes section of the pattern as well for your convenience with your purchase you will receive one pdf with everything you need to know to make the french lilacs baby blanket this pattern is written in standard american crochet terms
